lead_paragraph: Mateo Kovacic's late strike avoided embarrassment for Real Madrid as the European champions surrendered a two-goal lead before drawing 3-3 with Legia Warsaw in an enthralling Champions League game played amid an empty stadium on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Real Madrid Salvage Draw in 3-3 Thriller at Legia Warsaw
headline.main: Real Madrid Salvage Draw in 3-3 Thriller at Legia Warsaw
